title: Perform a Cycle Count
description: A store associate is assigned to perform a cycle count for the 'men's denim' category to verify inventory accuracy.

tasks.description: Open the cycle count task on a handheld device.
tasks.expected_outcome: The device displays a list of items in the men's denim category and their expected quantities.

tasks.description: Scan the barcode of the first item and physically count the quantity on the shelf and in the back room.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate performs a physical count of the item.

tasks.description: Enter the counted quantity into the device. Repeat for all items. Any discrepancies are automatically flagged for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: The physical counts are entered, and the system's inventory record is updated or a recount is triggered.
